name: Lure
note: Pulls adjacent foe to opposite side

name: Assembly
note: User and main target are both pulled back by 1 space

name: Group Flames
note: Converts grass, forest, thicket, wasteland, and house terrain into flames terrain for 1 turn

name: Poisoned Arrows
note: Mt x3 vs flying, inflicts poison on all targets

name: Flash-Fire Arrows
note: Mt x3 vs. flying. Converts grass, forest, thicket, wasteland, and house terrain into flames terrain for 1 turn.

name: Onslaught
note: Pushes adjacent foe back one space

name: Resonant Flames
note: Converts grass, forest, thicket, wasteland, and house terrain into flames terrain for 1 turn.

name: Reversal
note: User switches places with primary target

name: Poison Tactic
note: Inflicts poison on all foes in area

name: Absorption
note: Restores (damage dealt/2 HP to user from each target in the area

name: Blaze
note: converts grass, forest, thicket, wasteland, and house terrain into flames terrain for 1 turn
